titleInfo.title: Ontology-based Interpretation of Keywords for Semantic Search
The Semantic Web, 6th International Semantic Web Conference, 2nd Asian Semantic Web Conference, ISWC 2007 + ASWC 2007. Lecture Notes in Computer Science, 4825
